actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 51 of title 49, United States Code, to extend the coverage of the rules governing the transportation of hazardous materials, and for other purposes.
short_title: Postal Hazardous Materials Safety Enhancement Act

summary.text: Postal Hazardous Materials Safety Enhancement Act - Amends the Hazardous Materials Transportation Authorization Act of 1994 to extend Federal transportation of hazardous material safety requirements to the transportation of hazardous material in the U.S. mail.

titles.title: Postal Hazardous Materials Safety Enhancement Act
A bill to amend chapter 51 of title 49, United States Code, to extend the coverage of the rules governing the transportation of hazardous materials, and for other purposes.
